attributes.action: Welcome President Donald Trump's Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: An existing petition to prevent President of USA for an official State Visit is complete nonsense. This is the time we need the US so bad after leaving EU. And if he feels unwanted it can damage our economy. After PM May urged for great relationship and also invited him to UK is vital that we remain in good terms.
attributes.background: President Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, And he should also be invited to make an official State Visit because it would bring great respect to Her Majesty the Queen.
